name: War Snake line IO
description:
War Snake line IO is an addictive new mobile game that combines the classic game of snake vs block with elements. In this game you are a snake crawl instead of a blob and the goal is become the biggest and longest slither snake in the game.
How to Play :
- Control the crawl snake worms to avoid crashing into the other players.
- Use a speed button (shaped rocket, the lower right corner of the screen) to run faster.
